title: Mala Spice Mix
source: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
categories: The Book of Sichuan Chili Crisp - Jing Gao
ingredients: - ⅓ cup / 50g dried erjingtiao chili, cut into segments
directions: Directions:1. In a wok or frying pan over medium-low heat, toast the chili, cumin, fennel, star anise, cardamom, and cloves until fragrant, 3 to 4 minutes.2. Transfer the mixture to a small bowl and let cool.3. Add the sugar and salt to the toasted mixture and mix well.4. Using a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder, grind the entire mixture until it reaches a fine powder consistency.5. Use immediately or store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
